item.description: [y nacÃ­ agua y nacÃ­ flor de escupitajos] and i was born above the color blue and my sense of smell i was born in another country twenty years gone and i was born again here twenty years gone i never wanted to be eternal i served more realistic purposes like pleasure or poetry i did some semesters of a degree i stared at the sun until my eyes fell apart
